== Requirements  ==
To use measureit you need the following hardware:

  * a computer
this can be an old home computer that is not longer used. The hardware can be very old. Very old means that 64 MB Ram is more than enough... 
  * the smart meter cc128 hardware from [http://www.currentcost.com/ currentcost]


The project was designed with the latest product the [http://www.currentcost.com/product-cc128.html "Envi"]
